Package classes

Class DateTest

java.lang.Object
classes.DateTest
public class DateTest extends Object
Tests the Date class isValid() method. Multiple methods, 5 testing for not valid, 2 testing for valid.
Author:
Abhishek Thakare, Adhit Thakur

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • testDaysInFebNonLeap

      public void testDaysInFebNonLeap()
      Checks false output for isValid() method. Checks if there are 29 days in a non-leap year. Should assertFalse as this is not correct.

    • testValidMonth

      public void testValidMonth()
      Checks false output for isValid() method. Checks the month provided is valid. Should assertFalse as this is not correct.

    • testValidDaysOverThirty

      public void testValidDaysOverThirty()
      Checks false output for isValid() method. Checks if a month with 30 days can have 31 days. Should assertFalse as this is not correct.

    • testValidDaysOverThirtyOne

      public void testValidDaysOverThirtyOne()
      Checks false output for isValid() method. Checks if a month with 31 days can have 32 days. Should assertFalse as this is not correct.

    • testLeapYrOverMaxDays

      public void testLeapYrOverMaxDays()
      Checks false output for isValid() method. Checks if there are more than 29 days in a leap year for February. Should assertFalse as this is not correct.

    • testValidDay

      public void testValidDay()
      Checks false output for checkIfWithinBounds() method. Checks if inputting today's date is correct. Should assertFalse as this is not correct.

    • testValidYear

      public void testValidYear()
      Checks false output for checkIfWithinBounds() method. Checks if inputting future date is correct. Should assertFalse as this is not correct.

    • testGoodDateWithoutAccountLimits

      public void testGoodDateWithoutAccountLimits()
      Checks true output for isValid() method Checks the input of a normal date. Should assertTrue as this is correct.

    • testDaysInFebLeap

      public void testDaysInFebLeap()
      Checks true output for isValid() method Checks the input of 29th of February in a leap year. Should assertTrue as this is correct.
